ShouldersFixedBar.name: Fixed Bar Rear Deltoid Stretch
ShouldersFixedBar.preparation: Face stationary bar. Grasp stationary bar with one hand approximately face height. Rotate body so upper arm is positioned across neck.
ShouldersFixedBar.execution: Turn body into upper arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.

ShouldersRearDelt.name: Rear Deltoid Stretch
ShouldersRearDelt.preparation: Position arm across neck. Place opposite hand on elbow.
ShouldersRearDelt.execution: Push elbow toward neck. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
ShouldersRearDelt.comments: Positioning arm on lower chest stretches side deltoid. See Side Delt Stretch.
